Description: Sea Master 400 is a non-rotating, four faced S-band (NATO E/F-band) volume search radar designed to simultaneously provide air surveillance, helicopter control, surface surveillance and weapon control functions. Drawing on technology previously proved in Thales’ SMART-L, SMART-S Mk 2 and APAR radar systems, Sea Master 400 uses active phased array multibeam technology to enable the concurrent provision of situational and critical awareness through a single highly automated mode of operation.
